title: Is Randox a suitable sponsor for Grand National after Paterson sleaze row?
description: From JCR’s point of view, Randox has always been everything that Aintree could hope for in a sponsor for the world’s most famous steeplechase. Following on from a series of drink brands, their new partner was involved with neither betting nor booze, and instead promised to make its customers both happier and healthier.

title: LEXUS SPONSORS RASHID EQUESTRIAN AND HORSE RACING CLUB
description: In line with its strategy to support sports in the Kingdom of Bahrain, Ebrahim K. Kanoo, the sole distributor of Lexus vehicles in the Kingdom has sponsored the 13th Annual Lexus Cup, an annual national horse racing event in partnership with the Rashid Equestrian and Horse Racing Club of Bahrain at the Sakhir race track.

title: What will Horse Racing Look like in the Near Future?
description: The horse racing industry has come a long way since its days as the “sport for kings.” Events still attract thousands of fans and sponsors.
